class_notes: Permission required prior to enrollment. Please contact Alian Teach (ateach@emory.edu)
course_description: This course offers students the opportunity to design their own course of directed readings in consultation with a faculty advisor when there are no graduate course offerings available in their area of study.  Students may repeat this course for credit if the subject matter varies.
